name: Dead Years: Zombie Survival with your dog! (Canceled)
blurb: DEAD YEARS is an Indie Open World Zombie Survival Game for PC/Mac/Linux. Survive with the only friend you have left, your dog!

rewards.reward: The Best Deal Ever! (New) ==============================\r\nFull Digital Download of Dead Years +++ Exclusive Beta Access (Only available on Kickstarter!) +++ Access to the Secret Section of the Game's Website +++ Your Name as a Supporter in ALL Upcoming ZeroByte Studios Games +++ Be part of something big, show the world that a huge high quality game can be sold for only 9$! (~$8.20US/6\u20ac)
DIGITAL EDITION\r\n==============================\r\nFull digital download of Dead Years. (~$13.60US/9.9\u20ac)

PREMIUM EDITION
==============================
Full digital download of Dead Years 
+++ Exclusive beta access 
+++ Access to the secret section of the game’s website. (~$18.10US/13.2€)

WALL OF FAME EDITION
==============================
Full digital download of Dead Years 
+++ Exclusive beta access 
+++ Access to the secret section of the game’s website 
+++ Your name as a supporter in the game credits 
+++ Survivor rank on the official Dead Years’ forum 
+++ Digital download of Dead Years’ soundtrack. (~$22.60US/16.5€)

THE LOOT CRATE EDITION
==============================
Full digital download of Dead Years 
+++ Exclusive beta access 
+++ Access to the secret section of the game’s website 
+++ Your name as a supporter in the game credits 
+++ Collector rank on the official Dead Years’ forum 
+++ Digital download of Dead Years’ soundtrack 
+++ Limited Edition Autographed & Numbered Dead Years’ Poster (11”x17”) 
+++ 5 high-resolution digital posters of the game. (~$45US/33€) ============================== Add 10$ for shipping outside USA / Canada.

THE HIGH SECURITY EDITION
============================== 
All the rewards from the previous tier 
+++ Hardware Encrypted USB key filled with Dead Years exclusive production content! (~$72US/53€) ============================== Add 15$ for shipping outside USA / Canada.

THE FOUNDER EDITION
==============================
All the rewards from the previous tier 
+++ Name a minor location in the game!
+++ Special thanks in the game credits: Founder section. (~$113US/82€)

THE TAG
==============================
All the rewards from the Founder Edition 
+++ Graffiti of our choice of either your first name, last name or nickname in game! (~$136US/99€)

THE ARMORY
============================== 
All the rewards from the Founder Edition 
+++ Design a weapon or an armor of your choice with the team! (~$272US/197€)

THE SURVIVOR
==============================
All the rewards from the Founder Edition 
+++ Your survivor logbook! We'll ask you 20 questions and build a 300-350 word long survivor story with your answers! (~$272US/197€)

THE ZOMBIE EDITION
==============================
All the rewards from the Founder Edition 
+++ You as a zombie in the game! Must provide two quality photos of you. (~$453US/329€)

THE VIP EDITION
==============================
All the rewards from the Founder Edition 
+++ One very limited original zombie paper sketch, autographed by the art director (who is also an international artist) 
+++ Two VIP tickets for Dead Years’ Launch Party in the fortified city of Quebec, Canada. (~$1359US/987€)
==============================
Travel & Lodging are not included.

Meet the team
==============================
All the rewards from the VIP Edition +++ Spend a full day with the team +++ Design a Sidequest +++ Play the Dead Years' pre-alpha! (~$2720US/1985€) 
==============================
Travel & Lodging are not included.
